00069 void    b3HashedOverlappingPairCache::cleanProxyFromPairs(int proxy,b3Dispatcher* dispatcher)
00070 {
00071 
00072         class   CleanPairCallback : public b3OverlapCallback
00073         {
00074                 int m_cleanProxy;
00075                 b3OverlappingPairCache* m_pairCache;
00076                 b3Dispatcher* m_dispatcher;
00077 
00078         public:
00079                 CleanPairCallback(int cleanProxy,b3OverlappingPairCache* pairCache,b3Dispatcher* dispatcher)
00080                         :m_cleanProxy(cleanProxy),
00081                         m_pairCache(pairCache),
00082                         m_dispatcher(dispatcher)
00083                 {
00084                 }
00085                 virtual bool    processOverlap(b3BroadphasePair& pair)
00086                 {
00087                         if ((pair.x == m_cleanProxy) ||
00088                                 (pair.y == m_cleanProxy))
00089                         {
00090                                 m_pairCache->cleanOverlappingPair(pair,m_dispatcher);
00091                         }
00092                         return false;
00093                 }
00094                 
00095         };
00096 
00097         CleanPairCallback cleanPairs(proxy,this,dispatcher);
00098 
00099         processAllOverlappingPairs(&cleanPairs,dispatcher);
00100 
00101 }

00106 void    b3HashedOverlappingPairCache::removeOverlappingPairsContainingProxy(int proxy,b3Dispatcher* dispatcher)
00107 {
00108 
00109         class   RemovePairCallback : public b3OverlapCallback
00110         {
00111                 int m_obsoleteProxy;
00112 
00113         public:
00114                 RemovePairCallback(int obsoleteProxy)
00115                         :m_obsoleteProxy(obsoleteProxy)
00116                 {
00117                 }
00118                 virtual bool    processOverlap(b3BroadphasePair& pair)
00119                 {
00120                         return ((pair.x == m_obsoleteProxy) ||
00121                                 (pair.y == m_obsoleteProxy));
00122                 }
00123                 
00124         };
00125 
00126 
00127         RemovePairCallback removeCallback(proxy);
00128 
00129         processAllOverlappingPairs(&removeCallback,dispatcher);
00130 }

00135 
00136 b3BroadphasePair* b3HashedOverlappingPairCache::findPair(int proxy0, int proxy1)
00137 {
00138         b3g_findPairs++;
00139         if(proxy0 >proxy1) 
00140                 b3Swap(proxy0,proxy1);
00141         int proxyId1 = proxy0;
00142         int proxyId2 = proxy1;
00143 
00144         /*if (proxyId1 > proxyId2) 
00145                 b3Swap(proxyId1, proxyId2);*/
00146 
00147         int hash = static_cast<int>(getHash(static_cast<unsigned int>(proxyId1), static_cast<unsigned int>(proxyId2)) & (m_overlappingPairArray.capacity()-1));
00148 
00149         if (hash >= m_hashTable.size())
00150         {
00151                 return NULL;
00152         }
00153 
00154         int index = m_hashTable[hash];
00155         while (index != B3_NULL_PAIR && equalsPair(m_overlappingPairArray[index], proxyId1, proxyId2) == false)
00156         {
00157                 index = m_next[index];
00158         }
00159 
00160         if (index == B3_NULL_PAIR)
00161         {
00162                 return NULL;
00163         }
00164 
00165         b3Assert(index < m_overlappingPairArray.size());
00166 
00167         return &m_overlappingPairArray[index];
00168 }

00171 
00172 void    b3HashedOverlappingPairCache::growTables()
00173 {
00174 
00175         int newCapacity = m_overlappingPairArray.capacity();
00176 
00177         if (m_hashTable.size() < newCapacity)
00178         {
00179                 //grow hashtable and next table
00180                 int curHashtableSize = m_hashTable.size();
00181 
00182                 m_hashTable.resize(newCapacity);
00183                 m_next.resize(newCapacity);
00184 
00185 
00186                 int i;
00187 
00188                 for (i= 0; i < newCapacity; ++i)
00189                 {
00190                         m_hashTable[i] = B3_NULL_PAIR;
00191                 }
00192                 for (i = 0; i < newCapacity; ++i)
00193                 {
00194                         m_next[i] = B3_NULL_PAIR;
00195                 }
00196 
00197                 for(i=0;i<curHashtableSize;i++)
00198                 {
00199         
00200                         const b3BroadphasePair& pair = m_overlappingPairArray[i];
00201                         int proxyId1 = pair.x;
00202                         int proxyId2 = pair.y;
00203                         /*if (proxyId1 > proxyId2) 
00204                                 b3Swap(proxyId1, proxyId2);*/
00205                         int     hashValue = static_cast<int>(getHash(static_cast<unsigned int>(proxyId1),static_cast<unsigned int>(proxyId2)) & (m_overlappingPairArray.capacity()-1)); // New hash value with new mask
00206                         m_next[i] = m_hashTable[hashValue];
00207                         m_hashTable[hashValue] = i;
00208                 }
00209 
00210 
00211         }
00212 }

00214 b3BroadphasePair* b3HashedOverlappingPairCache::internalAddPair(int proxy0, int proxy1)
00215 {
00216         if(proxy0>proxy1) 
00217                 b3Swap(proxy0,proxy1);
00218         int proxyId1 = proxy0;
00219         int proxyId2 = proxy1;
00220 
00221         /*if (proxyId1 > proxyId2) 
00222                 b3Swap(proxyId1, proxyId2);*/
00223 
00224         int     hash = static_cast<int>(getHash(static_cast<unsigned int>(proxyId1),static_cast<unsigned int>(proxyId2)) & (m_overlappingPairArray.capacity()-1));      // New hash value with new mask
00225 
00226 
00227         b3BroadphasePair* pair = internalFindPair(proxy0, proxy1, hash);
00228         if (pair != NULL)
00229         {
00230                 return pair;
00231         }
00232         /*for(int i=0;i<m_overlappingPairArray.size();++i)
00233                 {
00234                 if(     (m_overlappingPairArray[i].m_pProxy0==proxy0)&&
00235                         (m_overlappingPairArray[i].m_pProxy1==proxy1))
00236                         {
00237                         printf("Adding duplicated %u<>%u\r\n",proxyId1,proxyId2);
00238                         internalFindPair(proxy0, proxy1, hash);
00239                         }
00240                 }*/
00241         int count = m_overlappingPairArray.size();
00242         int oldCapacity = m_overlappingPairArray.capacity();
00243         pair = &m_overlappingPairArray.expandNonInitializing();
00244 
00245         //this is where we add an actual pair, so also call the 'ghost'
00246 //      if (m_ghostPairCallback)
00247 //              m_ghostPairCallback->addOverlappingPair(proxy0,proxy1);
00248 
00249         int newCapacity = m_overlappingPairArray.capacity();
00250 
00251         if (oldCapacity < newCapacity)
00252         {
00253                 growTables();
00254                 //hash with new capacity
00255                 hash = static_cast<int>(getHash(static_cast<unsigned int>(proxyId1),static_cast<unsigned int>(proxyId2)) & (m_overlappingPairArray.capacity()-1));
00256         }
00257         
00258         *pair = b3MakeBroadphasePair(proxy0,proxy1);
00259         
00260 //      pair->m_pProxy0 = proxy0;
00261 //      pair->m_pProxy1 = proxy1;
00262         //pair->m_algorithm = 0;
00263         //pair->m_internalTmpValue = 0;
00264         
00265 
00266         m_next[count] = m_hashTable[hash];
00267         m_hashTable[hash] = count;
00268 
00269         return pair;
00270 }

00273 
00274 void* b3HashedOverlappingPairCache::removeOverlappingPair(int proxy0, int proxy1,b3Dispatcher* dispatcher)
00275 {
00276         b3g_removePairs++;
00277         if(proxy0>proxy1) 
00278                 b3Swap(proxy0,proxy1);
00279         int proxyId1 = proxy0;
00280         int proxyId2 = proxy1;
00281 
00282         /*if (proxyId1 > proxyId2) 
00283                 b3Swap(proxyId1, proxyId2);*/
00284 
00285         int     hash = static_cast<int>(getHash(static_cast<unsigned int>(proxyId1),static_cast<unsigned int>(proxyId2)) & (m_overlappingPairArray.capacity()-1));
00286 
00287         b3BroadphasePair* pair = internalFindPair(proxy0, proxy1, hash);
00288         if (pair == NULL)
00289         {
00290                 return 0;
00291         }
00292 
00293         cleanOverlappingPair(*pair,dispatcher);
00294 
00295         
00296 
00297         int pairIndex = int(pair - &m_overlappingPairArray[0]);
00298         b3Assert(pairIndex < m_overlappingPairArray.size());
00299 
00300         // Remove the pair from the hash table.
00301         int index = m_hashTable[hash];
00302         b3Assert(index != B3_NULL_PAIR);
00303 
00304         int previous = B3_NULL_PAIR;
00305         while (index != pairIndex)
00306         {
00307                 previous = index;
00308                 index = m_next[index];
00309         }
00310 
00311         if (previous != B3_NULL_PAIR)
00312         {
00313                 b3Assert(m_next[previous] == pairIndex);
00314                 m_next[previous] = m_next[pairIndex];
00315         }
00316         else
00317         {
00318                 m_hashTable[hash] = m_next[pairIndex];
00319         }
00320 
00321         // We now move the last pair into spot of the
00322         // pair being removed. We need to fix the hash
00323         // table indices to support the move.
00324 
00325         int lastPairIndex = m_overlappingPairArray.size() - 1;
00326 
00327         //if (m_ghostPairCallback)
00328         //      m_ghostPairCallback->removeOverlappingPair(proxy0, proxy1,dispatcher);
00329 
00330         // If the removed pair is the last pair, we are done.
00331         if (lastPairIndex == pairIndex)
00332         {
00333                 m_overlappingPairArray.pop_back();
00334                 return 0;
00335         }
00336 
00337         // Remove the last pair from the hash table.
00338         const b3BroadphasePair* last = &m_overlappingPairArray[lastPairIndex];
00339                 /* missing swap here too, Nat. */ 
00340         int lastHash = static_cast<int>(getHash(static_cast<unsigned int>(last->x), static_cast<unsigned int>(last->y)) & (m_overlappingPairArray.capacity()-1));
00341 
00342         index = m_hashTable[lastHash];
00343         b3Assert(index != B3_NULL_PAIR);
00344 
00345         previous = B3_NULL_PAIR;
00346         while (index != lastPairIndex)
00347         {
00348                 previous = index;
00349                 index = m_next[index];
00350         }
00351 
00352         if (previous != B3_NULL_PAIR)
00353         {
00354                 b3Assert(m_next[previous] == lastPairIndex);
00355                 m_next[previous] = m_next[lastPairIndex];
00356         }
00357         else
00358         {
00359                 m_hashTable[lastHash] = m_next[lastPairIndex];
00360         }
00361 
00362         // Copy the last pair into the remove pair's spot.
00363         m_overlappingPairArray[pairIndex] = m_overlappingPairArray[lastPairIndex];
00364 
00365         // Insert the last pair into the hash table
00366         m_next[pairIndex] = m_hashTable[lastHash];
00367         m_hashTable[lastHash] = pairIndex;
00368 
00369         m_overlappingPairArray.pop_back();
00370 
00371         return 0;
00372 }
00373 //#include <stdio.h>
00374 
00375 void    b3HashedOverlappingPairCache::processAllOverlappingPairs(b3OverlapCallback* callback,b3Dispatcher* dispatcher)
00376 {
00377 
00378         int i;
00379 
00380 //      printf("m_overlappingPairArray.size()=%d\n",m_overlappingPairArray.size());
00381         for (i=0;i<m_overlappingPairArray.size();)
00382         {
00383         
00384                 b3BroadphasePair* pair = &m_overlappingPairArray[i];
00385                 if (callback->processOverlap(*pair))
00386                 {
00387                         removeOverlappingPair(pair->x,pair->y,dispatcher);
00388 
00389                         b3g_overlappingPairs--;
00390                 } else
00391                 {
00392                         i++;
00393                 }
00394         }
00395 }

00401 void    b3HashedOverlappingPairCache::sortOverlappingPairs(b3Dispatcher* dispatcher)
00402 {
00404         b3BroadphasePairArray tmpPairs;
00405         int i;
00406         for (i=0;i<m_overlappingPairArray.size();i++)
00407         {
00408                 tmpPairs.push_back(m_overlappingPairArray[i]);
00409         }
00410 
00411         for (i=0;i<tmpPairs.size();i++)
00412         {
00413                 removeOverlappingPair(tmpPairs[i].x,tmpPairs[i].y,dispatcher);
00414         }
00415         
00416         for (i = 0; i < m_next.size(); i++)
00417         {
00418                 m_next[i] = B3_NULL_PAIR;
00419         }
00420 
00421         tmpPairs.quickSort(b3BroadphasePairSortPredicate());
00422 
00423         for (i=0;i<tmpPairs.size();i++)
00424         {
00425                 addOverlappingPair(tmpPairs[i].x ,tmpPairs[i].y);
00426         }
00427 
00428         
00429 }

00432 void*   b3SortedOverlappingPairCache::removeOverlappingPair(int proxy0,int proxy1, b3Dispatcher* dispatcher )
00433 {
00434         if (!hasDeferredRemoval())
00435         {
00436                 b3BroadphasePair findPair = b3MakeBroadphasePair(proxy0,proxy1);
00437                 
00438 
00439                 int findIndex = m_overlappingPairArray.findLinearSearch(findPair);
00440                 if (findIndex < m_overlappingPairArray.size())
00441                 {
00442                         b3g_overlappingPairs--;
00443                         b3BroadphasePair& pair = m_overlappingPairArray[findIndex];
00444                         
00445                         cleanOverlappingPair(pair,dispatcher);
00446                         //if (m_ghostPairCallback)
00447                         //      m_ghostPairCallback->removeOverlappingPair(proxy0, proxy1,dispatcher);
00448                         
00449                         m_overlappingPairArray.swap(findIndex,m_overlappingPairArray.capacity()-1);
00450                         m_overlappingPairArray.pop_back();
00451                         return 0;
00452                 }
00453         }
00454 
00455         return 0;
00456 }

00465 b3BroadphasePair*       b3SortedOverlappingPairCache::addOverlappingPair(int proxy0,int proxy1)
00466 {
00467         //don't add overlap with own
00468         b3Assert(proxy0 != proxy1);
00469 
00470         if (!needsBroadphaseCollision(proxy0,proxy1))
00471                 return 0;
00472         
00473         b3BroadphasePair* pair = &m_overlappingPairArray.expandNonInitializing();
00474         *pair = b3MakeBroadphasePair(proxy0,proxy1);
00475         
00476         
00477         b3g_overlappingPairs++;
00478         b3g_addedPairs++;
00479         
00480 //      if (m_ghostPairCallback)
00481 //              m_ghostPairCallback->addOverlappingPair(proxy0, proxy1);
00482         return pair;
00483         
00484 }
00485 
00490  b3BroadphasePair*      b3SortedOverlappingPairCache::findPair(int proxy0,int proxy1)
00491 {
00492         if (!needsBroadphaseCollision(proxy0,proxy1))
00493                 return 0;
00494 
00495         b3BroadphasePair tmpPair = b3MakeBroadphasePair(proxy0,proxy1);
00496         int findIndex = m_overlappingPairArray.findLinearSearch(tmpPair);
00497 
00498         if (findIndex < m_overlappingPairArray.size())
00499         {
00500                 //b3Assert(it != m_overlappingPairSet.end());
00501                  b3BroadphasePair* pair = &m_overlappingPairArray[findIndex];
00502                 return pair;
00503         }
00504         return 0;
00505 }

00517 
00518 void    b3SortedOverlappingPairCache::processAllOverlappingPairs(b3OverlapCallback* callback,b3Dispatcher* dispatcher)
00519 {
00520 
00521         int i;
00522 
00523         for (i=0;i<m_overlappingPairArray.size();)
00524         {
00525         
00526                 b3BroadphasePair* pair = &m_overlappingPairArray[i];
00527                 if (callback->processOverlap(*pair))
00528                 {
00529                         cleanOverlappingPair(*pair,dispatcher);
00530                         pair->x = -1;
00531                         pair->y = -1;
00532                         m_overlappingPairArray.swap(i,m_overlappingPairArray.size()-1);
00533                         m_overlappingPairArray.pop_back();
00534                         b3g_overlappingPairs--;
00535                 } else
00536                 {
00537                         i++;
00538                 }
00539         }
00540 }

00553 }

00574 void    b3SortedOverlappingPairCache::cleanProxyFromPairs(int proxy,b3Dispatcher* dispatcher)
00575 {
00576 
00577         class   CleanPairCallback : public b3OverlapCallback
00578         {
00579                 int m_cleanProxy;
00580                 b3OverlappingPairCache* m_pairCache;
00581                 b3Dispatcher* m_dispatcher;
00582 
00583         public:
00584                 CleanPairCallback(int cleanProxy,b3OverlappingPairCache* pairCache,b3Dispatcher* dispatcher)
00585                         :m_cleanProxy(cleanProxy),
00586                         m_pairCache(pairCache),
00587                         m_dispatcher(dispatcher)
00588                 {
00589                 }
00590                 virtual bool    processOverlap(b3BroadphasePair& pair)
00591                 {
00592                         if ((pair.x == m_cleanProxy) ||
00593                                 (pair.y == m_cleanProxy))
00594                         {
00595                                 m_pairCache->cleanOverlappingPair(pair,m_dispatcher);
00596                         }
00597                         return false;
00598                 }
00599                 
00600         };
00601 
00602         CleanPairCallback cleanPairs(proxy,this,dispatcher);
00603 
00604         processAllOverlappingPairs(&cleanPairs,dispatcher);
00605 
00606 }
